title: Brown v Board of Education - decision

content.question: Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka was a Supreme Court decision that

choices.label: was a forerunner of the Kansas-Nebraska Act
established free public colleges in the United States
declared racially segregated public schools inherently unequal
established free public elementary and secondary schools in the United States
provided for federal support of parochial schools

content.answer: declared racially segregated public schools inherently unequal

topic.text: 8.6: Early Steps in the Civil Rights Movement (1940s and 1950s)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
